B2B.description: In Client Streaming Statistics lost packets should be zero
In Client Streaming Statistics Received Packets should be zero
In Client Streaming Statistics Received Bytes should be zero
In Client Streaming Statistics Sent Bytes should be greater than zero for Unidirectional C->S streamining
In Client Streaming Statistics Sent Packets should be greater than zero for Unidirectional C->S streamining
In Server  Streaming Statistics Lost Packets should be equal zero
In Server  Streaming Statistics Received Bytes should be greater than zero for Unidirectional  C->S streaming
In Server  Streaming Statistics Received Packets should be greater than zero for Unidirectional  C->S streaming
In Server  Streaming Statistics Sent Packets should be  zero for Unidirectional  C->S streaming
In Server  Streaming Statistics Sent Bytes should be zero for Unidirectional  C->S streaming
